tR9kO5i36itvGGdoa.name: Battlesense
tR9kO5i36itvGGdoa.notes: When Active: +1 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

tt9J6zCFtLogWtY8L.name: Battlesense
tt9J6zCFtLogWtY8L.notes: When Active: +2 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

tdcm8CYOa-hG85Qun.name: Battlesense
tdcm8CYOa-hG85Qun.notes: When Active: +3 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

t69MQZtmavJ_IjSz-.name: Empathy
t69MQZtmavJ_IjSz-.notes: Acts as Empathy (Accessibility, Not on Elder Things); 1 FP/use

tSqnE48vGCzAAU5Vh.name: Levitation
tSqnE48vGCzAAU5Vh.notes: Flight: Move 1, within 5' of horizontal surface

tDkW1uo2rkEhHcGZ8.name: Levitation
tDkW1uo2rkEhHcGZ8.notes: Flight: Basic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

tWJV8zA4PyMWEBHIW.name: Levitation
tWJV8zA4PyMWEBHIW.notes: Flight: 2xBasic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

T_-FsrbPUM89x2f90.name: 25 Points chosen from the above or:

features.situation: from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)

t5pQW11HqBpfkX70K.name: Luck
t5pQW11HqBpfkX70K.notes: Usable once per hour of play

tgFFTVtuFdWqSv4tW.name: Magic Resistance
tgFFTVtuFdWqSv4tW.notes: -1/level to skill for others to cast a spell on you. +1/level to resist spells.

tGEIddSLPZtokuKls.name: Resistance to Psionics
tGEIddSLPZtokuKls.notes: -1/level to skill for others to use psionics on you. +1/level to resist psionic abilities.

tRSjpbmTPG9w5I3x4.name: Signature Gear
tRSjpbmTPG9w5I3x4.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

features.situation: from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

mS-4GBCktHgXXqYqV.name: Specialized
mS-4GBCktHgXXqYqV.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

tgD1yt7-nG0P4v3le.name: Unfazeable
tgD1yt7-nG0P4v3le.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

features.situation: from others who can hear your voice

t6szOCFk7snt_zV2i.name: Curious
t6szOCFk7snt_zV2i.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

tsd5_c7nOY9Y7DiaX.name: Combat Paralysis
tsd5_c7nOY9Y7DiaX.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tkfrj3RlznbIuWMae.name: Loner
tkfrj3RlznbIuWMae.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

tZe75XBqagF1aAMfe.name: Low Pain Threshold
tZe75XBqagF1aAMfe.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tAsemmOs1k5dlPPdh.name: Overconfidence
tAsemmOs1k5dlPPdh.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

tSdWcXJrmepxS-5B5.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tSdWcXJrmepxS-5B5.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

t9wUW_b7dutYWjgZh.name: Pyromania
t9wUW_b7dutYWjgZh.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to set a fire

tJ7Ey0MfZiOePC-dL.name: Selfish
tJ7Ey0MfZiOePC-dL.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

trBLJZ4yY6mtKqh-8.name: Unfit
trBLJZ4yY6mtKqh-8.notes: -1 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc. As well, you lose FP at twice the normal rate.

Tx3bmzeOG_jUxLl9X.name: -25 Points chosen from the above or:

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

tAfnKNNgsQ6MaZdWn.name: Obsession
tAfnKNNgsQ6MaZdWn.notes: Become a world-class psi at any cost; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

tQc8vBLQKBqrHL9EI.name: Obsession
tQc8vBLQKBqrHL9EI.notes: Learn something dangerous involving Elder Things; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

SLnIOHOesNlOjDBcq.name: Choose 2, or raise Melee Weapon Skill by 1:

S5wfwc2hVNle4sB8R.name: Choose 7 or 1 point to buy anything from the above category:

ScFLlIaK6uAUOjPLU.name: Choose 4, or 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level
